TAX4001 - Taxation of Business Entities.name: TAX4001 - Taxation of Business Entities and Transactions

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Junior standing, Accounting major or minor, ACG 3131 with a grade of "B" (3.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Federal income tax laws affecting the taxation of business entities and transactions.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Kenneth G Dixon School of Accounting

Prerequisites/Corequisites.title: Prerequisites/Corequisites
Prerequisites/Corequisites.text: Junior standing, Accounting major or minor, TAX 4001 with a grade of "C" (2.0) or better.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Study of the basic theory, concepts, practice and methods of determining the taxable income and tax liabilities of individuals.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: Kenneth G Dixon School of Accounting
